# GSSyncedDirectoryState

**Class**

Represents the state and its associated properties of the directory

## Declaration

```swift
class GSSyncedDirectoryState
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.GameSave/documentation/GameSave/GSSyncedDirectoryState/state] property to determine the validity of the other properties

## Directory state information

- **GSSyncState**
- **state**: Specifies the current state of the directory
- **conflictedVersions**: The conflicting versions.
- **error**: The error preventing you from using the directory.
- **url**: The URL of a directory to read and write game-save data in.

## Accessing a directory

- **open(forContainerIdentifier:)**: Requests an instance of the game-save directory.
- **directoryState**: The state of the directory.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
